data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Garcia-Becerra, Rafael, Belokobylskij, Sergey A. (2016): Aspilotaajara sp. n. (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae), the first species of the genus Aspilota Foerster from caves. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 52: 153-162, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.52.10067, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.52.10067
